short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Ask Chat GPT about highlighted text

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
*****************************************************************************************************
The Ask Chat GPT Chrome Extension has been updated to work with the new Chat GPT user interface, which is vastly different than the previous version. However, there has been no change to the extension interface. It remains as simple to use as before!
*****************************************************************************************************
Enhance your browsing experience with our Chrome extension, designed to seamlessly integrate with the ChatGPT web app. With a simple highlight of text and a click, you can instantly search the selected text in ChatGPT without leaving your current tab. Our extension automates the process by inserting the text into ChatGPT's input area and submitting the query for you, saving you valuable time and effort. Customize your settings to suit your workflow, and rest assured that your data is handled with strict privacy standards. This extension is compatible with the latest versions of Chrome and requires minimal permissions to operate efficiently. Find information about updates and the beta version of the extension on the extensions GitHub repository (https://github.com/BrianARuff/ask-chat-gpt-chrome-extension).
*****************************************************************************************************
